code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{AppNavBar}from"baseui/app-nav-bar";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Navbar(){const[activeItem,setActiveItem]=useState("Home");const navigate=useNavigate();const mainItems=[{label:"Home"},{label:"Search Weather Info"},{label:"Add Weather Info"},{label:"Update Weather Info"},{label:"Delete Weather Info"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppNavBar,{title:"Weather Information",mainItems:mainItems,onMainItemSelect:item=>{setActiveItem(item.label);if(item.label==="Home"){navigate("/");}else if(item.label==="Search Weather Info"){navigate("/search-weather");}else if(item.label==="Add Weather Info"){navigate("/add-weather");}else if(item.label==="Update Weather Info"){navigate("/search-weather");}else if(item.label==="Delete Weather Inf"){navigate("/search-weather");}}});}
